contentrichtext.text: {{oldffdfull|date=2009-04-10}} {{Non-free use rationale| Article = Dial M for Murder | Description = Screenshot of the principal characters in ''[[Dial M for Murder]]'' (1954). From left to right: Mark Halliday ([[Robert Cummings]]), Margot Wendice ([[Grace Kelly]]) and Tony Wendice ([[Ray Milland]]). | Author = [[Warner Brothers]] | Source = Single frame screenshot from ''[[Dial M for Murder]]'' (1954) | Portion = Single frame from 105 min motion picture | Low_resolution = yes | Purpose = To identify three of the principal characters in the movie, in context, and to show their interaction. The characters, and the related plot elements are the subject of significant discussion in the article. No other non-free image is used to illustrate these points. | Replaceability = No free replacement is possible for a copyrighted movie screenshot }} == Licensing == {{Non-free film screenshot|image has rationale=yes}}
